categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A battle was fought in the mountains of Naator in 3 ABY between the Alliance to Restore the Republic's 61st Mobile Infantry and the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War as part of Operation Ringbreaker.
The battle of Naator was first mentioned in Alexander Freed's 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company.
